alert.note: Alert for Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 09 at 2:58AM PST until January 09 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, North Oregon Coast and Coast Range of Northwest Oregon. In Washington, Willapa Hills and South Washington Coast. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong winds may result in downed tree limbs, potentially leading to a few power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; North Oregon Coast
